data.actual_result: One or more of the buttons is cutoff/not visible.
data.short_description: [In Resolutions with a Width Less Than 1920]  When in 200% zoom (and sometimes 175%), the approve/deny friend request buttons are hidden/cut off.
data.steps_to_repro: - Ensure your resolution has a width lower than 1920 - Ensure Windows is on 100% zoom - Change Discord zoom to 200% - Go to friend requests tab - Observe that one or more of the accept/deny icons is cutoff/hidden completely
